name: Boreal Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cinder Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a 15-foot cone of superheated air filled with white-hot embers. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
